column4: OPERA is a much superior browser than Firefox, since Ubuntu is including closed-source into the distro, what the heck, why not include OPERA?
i am trying for a few days opera, and it's really faster and superior, now it's got a new feature, speed dial it's so cool
unfortunately, i don't believe that they will ever make opera the default because: a) it is not open source, b) many people like firefoxs
